extendedInfo.description: There are over 50 of these "Local Deal-a-Day" sprouting up across the country. Instead of you hunting, this app present them to you right here!Sites include Groupon, LivingSocial, FreshGuide, ScoopSt many many more!You can easy to share deal with your friends with many ways, like twitter, facebook, sms, email and so on.

reviews.comment: Could use a facelift, but compiles a variety of cool discounts. DOES have different cities; update list & hit the arrow next to the city listed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Group buy, today
reviews.comment: Waste of time and battery.  I\'m not in new York.  Nor, I\'m quite sure, are most of the rest of us.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps saying network unavailable..i have 4g and full bars..all other apps working fine. Great idea work out the bugs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only city i see is for new york....no other cities..uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Handy! Visually a bit clunky but does what it is supposed to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Took forever to update the deals and then only showed Groupon deals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a waste of time...why the heck it even showed as recommended is beyond me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Google nexus7
reviews.comment: This app sucks hung up and never connected.
reviews.author: Crystal Coleman

reviews.title: NYC as my only option?
reviews.comment: I live in Atlanta, Ga. The only city available in list is NYC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was able to change city (Im in Denver) but then it just says update failed & nothing comes up. Evo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only had New York. Tried to update list but still only New York.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uninstalled.. Honolulu is not part of the list unfortunately (and yes, I did the list update thing)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could not pull up my city, only gave me new york city or akron. Kept clicking on get choice city and the only city that came up was akron. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I was only able to select two cities, neither of which are near me. Will try using again in the future when hopefully more cities are avail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: You have to update the list you sillies. App works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thanks, I found Seattle! =o) Contact developer for help if you can\'t find your city. It is there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I have the RAZR MAXX with ICS. The app won\'t let me change the city from New York. The app doesn\'t even load the deals for New York. Don\'t bother downloading.
reviews.author: A Google User
